tit.cmt: Removed "(a former railway station)", as it wasn't in the original sentence, and the translation is supposed to be kept as close as possible to the original.

sen.j: 岡崎道駅（おかざきみちえき）は、京阪電気鉄道京阪京津線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Okazaki-michi Station was a railway station of Keihan Keishin Line of Keihan Denki Tetsudo (Keihan Railway Company)..
Okazaki-michi Station was a railway station on the Keihan Keishin Line of Keihan Denki Tetsudo (the Keihan Railway Company).
sen.cmt: Changed "on" to "of", added "the", removed extra period from sentence end.
sen.e: Okazaki-michi Station was a railway station on the Keihan Keishin Line of the Keihan Railway Company.
sen.cmt: 京阪電気鉄道→the Keihan Railway Company としました。

sen.j: それは、かつて京都市東山区にあった。
sen.e: It was located in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
It was located in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: It was located in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 京津線の線路を三条通上に移設したことで廃駅となった。
sen.e: When railwayl tracks of Keishin Line were moved to Sanjo-dori Street, this station was abolished.
When the Keishin Line tracks were moved to Sanjo-dori Street, this station was closed.
sen.cmt: Changed "railwayl tracks of Keishin Line" to "the Keishin Line tracks", changed "abolished" to "closed".
sen.e: When the Keishin Line tracks were moved to Sanjo-dori Street, this station was closed.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

tit.cmt: コロンを削除しました。

sen.j: 1912年（大正元年）8月15日 京津電気軌道開業時に広道駅として開業。
sen.e: On August 15, 1912, when Keishin Denki Kido (Keishin Electric Tramway) began business, Hiromichi Station was opened.
sen.cmt: 「京津電気軌道」の正式英文名不詳
sen.e: Hiromichi Station was opened on August 15, 1912, when the Keishin Denki Kido (Keishin Electric Tramway) began running.
sen.cmt: Moved "Hiromichi Station was opened" from end to beginning, inserted "the", changed "began business" to "began running".
sen.e: August 15, 1912: Hiromichi Station was opened when the Keishin Electric Tramway began running.
sen.cmt: 日付＋コロン の表現に修正しました。京津電気軌道→Keishin Electric Tramway としました。

sen.j: 1928年（昭和3年）7月1日 駅名を岡崎道駅に改称。
sen.e: On July 1, 1928, its name was changed to Okazaki-michi Station.
On July 1, 1928, its name was changed to Okazaki-michi Station.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: July 1, 1928: Its name was changed to Okazaki-michi Station.
sen.cmt: 日付＋コロン の表現に修正しました。

sen.e: In 1931, this station became abolished.
In 1931, this station was closed.
sen.cmt: Changed "became abolished" to "was closed".
sen.e: 1931: The station was closed.
sen.cmt: 日付＋コロン の表現に修正しました。

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.e: Keihan Denki Tetsudo (Keihan Railway Company):
sen.cmt: 1943年10月の旧阪急との合併以前の旧京阪電気鉄道はKeihan Railwayといい、現在の京阪電気鉄道はKeihan Electric Railway。
sen.e: Keihan Denki Tetsudo (Keihan Railway Company):
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Keihan Railway Company
sen.cmt: コロンを削除しました。京阪電気鉄道→the Keihan Railway Company としました。

sen.e: Keishin Line:
Keishin Line:
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Keishin Line
sen.cmt: コロンを削除しました。

sen.j: 平安神宮前駅 - 岡崎道駅 - 蹴上駅 (京阪)
sen.e: Heianjingu-mae Station -- Okazaki-michi Station -- Keage Station (Keihan)
Heianjingu-mae Station -- Okazaki-michi Station -- Keage Station (Keihan)
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Heianjingu-mae Station - Okazaki-michi Station - Keage Station (Keihan)
sen.cmt: ハイフンを削除しました。
